name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: JobHunnt AI - Free Job Tracking Dashboard & Resume Builder

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect jobs to your JobHunnt AI Dashboard from LinkedIn, ZipRecruiter, Indeed, Monster, Glassdoor and Google in one-click

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
JobHunnt Chrome Extension helps you streamline your job search by allowing you to collect jobs from LinkedIn, ZipRecruiter, Indeed, Monster, Glassdoor, and Google with a single click. Easily import these listings into your JobHunnt Dashboard and use AI to generate tailored resumes and cover letters for every application.

Key Features:
✔ One-click job collection from top platforms.
✔ AI-powered resume and cover letter builder.
✔ Track your applications with the intuitive Job Dashboard.
✔ Import your LinkedIn profile as a resume instantly.
✔ Ask any questions to JobHunnt's resume and job aware AI Assistant
✔ Get help from AI Assistant with interview questions, writing emails and more

Make your job search faster and more efficient with JobHunnt's seamless job application management tools.
